name: Shanti Cancer Program
description: The program adds to hospital-based care and reduces the barriers that underserved women face accessing treatment and transitioning into survivorship. By providing culturally competent care navigation, emotional and practical support, and survivorship support activities. They work closely with social workers and health providers to ensure that clients are able to remain in treatment and health building services. They continually work with partners and conduct outreach to build new collaborations
